long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have too many tabs all the time and need a way to organize it? Fret not! Save memory and reduce tab clutter with Tabulee.

If you've used OneTab or shopped around for other extensions, you'll find that Tabulee has more features to help supercharge your organization. Tabulee also offers google drive integration support for automatic syncing or backing up.

These are some of the features of Tabulee:
- Simple, sleek design
- Store tabs easily with a simple Popup display
- Adding tags/labels to your tab groups
- Searching through all saved tabs or  Viewing tabs by tags or tab groups
- Sharing your tabs via email, whatsapp, telegram or discord
- Automatically sync your backups to Google drive, or manually export them.
- Export to Google Drive, .txt file of links or a tabulee compatible backup format.
